dmca.title: Unauthorized Use of Classmates Online, Inc.'s IP on FindClassmateOnline.com Website
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: McGuane, Tara [mailto:TMcGuane@classmates.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 17, 2006 2:45 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; legal@theplanet.com
Subject: Unauthorized Use of Classmates Online, Inc.'s IP on
FindClassmateOnline.com Website


Dear Sir or Madam, 
 
In addition to the violations committed below, your customer has also
appropriated the copygirthed works of Classmates Online, Inc.  On the
FindClassmateOnline.com homepage you will find the marketing language "Leap
through a portal to the best of your past. Rediscover the people, places,
and pop culture of your youth. Reconnect with the past and build friendships
for the future."  Classmates Online developed that marketing language which
can be found on our non registered user homepage at
<http://www.classmates.com> www.classmates.com.  This, along with other
portions of our website, was initially copyrighted in 2001 and can be found
as part of our submission material under Copyright Reg No. TX 5-508-975.
 
Pursuant of the terms set forth in the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, we
request that you expeditiously remove or disable access to the
www.findclassmateonline.com website as set forth in your copyright
infringement policy found at http://www.theplanet.com/legal/copyright.html. 
 
Sincerely, 
 
______________________________
Tara McGuane
IP and Marketing Compliance Manager
Classmates Online, Inc.
2001 Lind Avenue SW, Suite 500
Renton, WA 98055
T: 425.917.4777
F: 425.271.5595
TMcGuane@corp.untd.com
This transmission is intended for the sole use of the individual(s) to whom
it is addressed and may contain information that is proprietary, privileged,
attorney work product or otherwise exempt from disclosure. Please contact
the sender if this transmission is received in error and immediately delete
this message and its attachments from your system. Unauthorized use is
prohibited.
 
  _____  

From: McGuane, Tara 
Sent: Wednesday, February 15, 2006 3:40 PM
To: 'qqebiz@gmail.com'
Subject: FindClassmateOnline.com eBay Auction, Item No. 7589279077 



Dear Sir or Madam:

We are writing in response to the attempted eBay auction of the
FindClassmateOnline.com website and your unauthorized use and
missapproproriation of our company name and registered trademarks in your
domain and on your site. 

As you probably know, Classmates Online, Inc. ("Classmates Online") owns and
operates the popular website,  <outbind://147/www.classmates.com>
www.classmates.com, the leading online community that connects more than 40
million members with friends, family, military and work colleagues.
Classmates Online also owns the exclusive trademark rights for
CLASSMATES.COM (Reg. No. 2,584,325), and CLASSMATES (Reg. Nos. 2,758,007 and
2,755,056) in the United States and internationally. Classmates Online has
made a substantial investment in developing and providing its services and
has acquired a tremendous amount of goodwill and brand equity in the
CLASSMATES name. As we hope you can appreciate, Classmates Online is
concerned that your unauthorized use of our company name and the CLASSMATES
registered trademarks on your site and in your domain name may cause
confusion as to whether you or your company's activities are authorized,
endorsed or sponsored by Classmates Online when, in fact, they are not.
Additionally, your auction references the FindClassmateOnline.com in several
locations as the domain for sale.  Please note, Classmates Online, Inc. is
the actual owner of this domain.  

Federal and state laws protect against the unauthorized use, sale, or
offering for sale a domain name which infringes another's trademark.
Infringers who have been notified of such infringing activity, but do not
cease their infringements, may also be considered "willful" and could be
subject to monetary damages. Having received this e-mail, you are on such
notice. 

While we understand that you may have registered the above domain name and
developed the FindClassmateOnline.com website without full knowledge of the
law in this area and Classmates Online respects your right of expression and
your desire to conduct business on the Internet, we must enforce our own
rights in order to protect our valuable and famous trademark(s). For these
reasons, and to avoid consumer confusion, Classmates Online must insist that
you cease development and sale of competing websites which incorporate the
use of our corporate name and our CLASSMATES  trademarks and transfer the
FindClassmateOnline.com domain name to Classmates Online. 

By providing you with this notice and clarifying Classmates Online's rights,
we trust that you will promptly cease your unauthorized use and that we may
each continue to pursue our businesses and interests without necessity of
legal action. 

Sincerely, 

______________________________
Tara McGuane
IP and Marketing Compliance Manager
Classmates Online, Inc. 
A United Online, Inc. Company
2001 Lind Avenue SW, Suite 500
Renton, WA 98055
T: 425.917.4777
F: 425.271.5595
TMcGuane@corp.untd.com

This transmission is intended for the sole use of the individual(s) to whom
it is addressed and may contain information that is proprietary, privileged,
attorney work product or otherwise exempt from disclosure. Please contact
the sender if this transmission is received in error and immediately delete
this message and its attachments from your system. Unauthorized use is
prohibited.
